definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: door-post, gate-post, abs. ´[[מ]] Ex 21:6, Is 57:8; cstr. [[מְזוּזַת]] 1Sa 1:9, Ez Eze 46:2 + Ez Eze 41:21 (del. SyrVer Co cf. LXX Hi), Eze 45:19, Eze 45:19 (in both [[מְזוּזוֹת]] LXX SyrVer Vulgate Co); sf. [[מְזוּזׇתִי]] Ez Eze 43:8, [[מְזוּזׇתָם]] v:Eze 43:8; pl. [[מְזוּזוֹת]] 1Ki 6:31 + 2 t. (+ Ez Eze 45:19, Eze 45:19 Co v. supr.), [[מְזוּזׁת]] Ex 12:7 + 4 t., [[מְזֻזוֹת]] De 6:9, Ju Jdg 16:3; —door-post, gate-post,
of dwelling-house Ex 12:7 (P), v:Ex 12:22, v:Ex 12:23, Ex 21:6 (all JE), De 6:9, De 11:20 cf. Is 57:8; also [[פְּתָחָָי]] ´[[מ]] Pr 8:34, [[מְזוּזׇתָם]] Ez Eze 43:8; of Sol.'s house 1Ki 7:5.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of Sol.'s temple 1Ki 6:33; of the [[דְּבִיר]] v:1Ki 6:31.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of Ezek.'s temple Ez Eze 41:21 (del. Co v. supr.), Eze 43:8 ([[מְזוּזׇתִי]]), [[הַבַּיִת]] ´[[מ]] Ez Eze 45:19, [[שַׁעַר]] ´[[מ]] v:Eze 45:9, cf. Eze 46:2.
